name: Lemon Dilly and Smoked Salmon Pinwheels
description: A delicious appy or mealtime solution any night of the week.

ingredients.name: (8 oz/250 g) spreadable light cream cheese

preparation: Combine first 5 ingredients and stir until smooth.
Spread cream cheese mixture over tortillas. Lay slices of smoked salmon over cream cheese.
Tightly roll up and wrap with cling film. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Remove plastic. With a sharp knife, slice each roll into 1" pieces.
Arrange on decorative platter and serve with lemon slices.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
